name: Solar Sim-Tem
description:
Solar Sim-Tem is a news simulator that pulls headlines from the planets you create.

How to Play
  • Your your mouse to generate up to three planets!
  • Each planet created adds more possible news to the space feed.
  • You can see the news by idling on the title screen.
Credits Game
  • Systemlogoff - You can also reach me via email.
